title: Basic.en
content: Obsidian Beginner‚Äôs Guide (English) ‚Äì Clean & Visual [!warning] Reminder: Below syntax examples are given. Some of them should be wrapped with two ``` backticks when using. They are marked as #InsideTripleBacktics in examples. ![[somefile.png]] 001. Install Obsidian in 1 Minute Go to obsidian.md Download the installer for your OS (Windows/Mac/Linux) Run the installer ‚Üí Follow prompts Launch Obsidian ‚Üí Done! It's free and open-source. 002. Switch to Uzbek Language Fast Settings ‚Üí Appearance ‚Üí Language Select ‚ÄúUzbek (–é–∑–±–µ–∫)‚Äù Restart the app ‚Üí Everything switches to Uzbek. 003. Create New Note in One Click Press Ctrl + N ‚Üí New blank note Or click ‚Äú+‚Äù in the left sidebar Name the file right away (supports Latin or Cyrillic). 004. Headings with Hash Levels Syntax: # H1 Heading (Biggest) ## H2 Heading ### H3 Heading #### H4 Heading ##### H5 Heading ###### H6 Heading (smallest) Result: H1 Heading (Biggest) H2 Heading H3 Heading H4 Heading H5 Heading H6 Heading (smallest) 005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian Syntax: **bold** or __bold__ Result: bold or bold 006. How to Write Italic Text Fast Syntax: *italic* or _italic_ Result: italic or italic 007. Strikethrough Text Tutorial Syntax: ~~strikethrough~~ Result: strikethrough 008. Highlight Important Text Easily Syntax: ==highlight== Result: 009. Toolbar Quick Formatting Tips Select text ‚Üí use: Ctrl+B ‚Üí bold Ctrl+I ‚Üí italic Ctrl+D ‚Üí strikethrough Alt+H ‚Üí highlight 010. Horizontal Divider Line in Obsidian Syntax: --- *** ___ Result: 011. Block Quotes for Better Notes Syntax: > Single level quote >> Nested quote Result: Single level quote Nested quote 012. Bulleted Lists in Obsidian Syntax: - Item 1 - Item 2 - Sub-item Result: Item 1 Item 2 Sub-item 013. Numbered Lists Step by Step Syntax: 1. First 2. Second 3. Sub 1 4. Sub 2 Result: First Second 3. Sub 1 4. Sub 2 014. Indent and Outdent Lists Tab ‚Üí indent Shift+Tab ‚Üí outdent 015. Task Checkboxes in Obsidian Syntax: - [ ] Not done - [x] Done - [>] Deferred - [?] Question Result: Not done Done [>] Deferred [?] Question 016. Add External Links Correctly Syntax: [Obsidian](https://obsidian.md) Result: ‚Üí Obsidian 017. Simple Internal Links Wiki Style Syntax: 031. Math in Obsidian Result: ‚Üí 031. Math in Obsidian 018. Aliased Internal Links Syntax: LaTeX Guide Result: ‚Üí [LaTeX Guide](031. Math in Obsidian) 019. Link to Headings Inside Note Syntax: Bold Text Result: ‚Üí [Bold Text](Obsidian Guide#005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian) 020. Embed Notes with Exclamation Syntax: !001. Install Obsidian in 1 Minute Result: ‚Üí (embeds the whole note here) Resize example: !300 021. Code Blocks and Syntax Highlight Syntax:print("Hello Obsidian!") Result: print("Hello Obsidian!") 022. Create Tables in Obsidian Fast Syntax: | Name | Age | City | |:-------|:---:|-----------:| | Ali | 25 | Tashkent | | Vali | 30 | Samarkand | Result: Name Age City Ali 25 Tashkent Vali 30 Samarkand 023. Assets Folder Setup Syntax: Create folder ‚Üí Assets or Attachments ‚Üí drop all media there. 024. Embed Audio Files in Notes Syntax: !song.mp3 Plays inline. Result: 025. Embed Local Video Files Easily Syntax: markdown !video.mp4 html <video src="local_path_or_external_url_link" width="300" controls></video> Result: 026. Embed PDF Documents in Obsidian Syntax: !paper.pdf !200 !paper.pdf#page=5 Shows page 5 directly. Result: !200 027. Add and Embed Images Properly Syntax: ![.[photo.jpg].] ![.[photo.jpg|400x300].] ![.[photo.jpg|right|250].] Aligns right with width 250px. Result: 028. Embed Maps Syntax: <iframe width=600 height=600 src="the_url_of_a_map" /> Result: 029. Callouts for Beautiful Notes Syntax: > [!info] Title > Useful information Result: [!info] Title Useful information Syntax: > [!tip] Quick Tip > Save time with this! Result: [!tip] Quick Tip Save time with this! Syntax: > [!warning] Careful > This might break something Result: [!warning] Careful This might break something Other types: note, abstract, success, error, example, quote 030. Flowcharts and Diagrams Fast (Mermaid) #InsideTripleBacktics Syntax: mermaid graph TD A[Start] --> B{Decision} B -->|Yes| C[Good] B -->|No| D[Try Again] Result: graph TD A[Start] --> B{Decision} B -->|Yes| C[Good] B -->|No| D[Try Again] 031. Math in Obsidian | LaTeX Inline: Syntax `$E = mc^2--- {"dg-publish":true,"permalink":"/education/obsidian-tutorial/basic-en/","noteIcon":"","created":"2025-11-25T18:04:33.314+05:00","updated":"2025-11-25T21:06:34.015+05:00"} Obsidian Beginner‚Äôs Guide (English) ‚Äì Clean & Visual [!warning] Reminder: Below syntax examples are given. Some of them should be wrapped with two ``` backticks when using. They are marked as #InsideTripleBacktics in examples. ![[[[somefile.png]]]] 001. Install Obsidian in 1 Minute Go to obsidian.md Download the installer for your OS (Windows/Mac/Linux) Run the installer ‚Üí Follow prompts Launch Obsidian ‚Üí Done! It's free and open-source. 002. Switch to Uzbek Language Fast Settings ‚Üí Appearance ‚Üí Language Select ‚ÄúUzbek (–é–∑–±–µ–∫)‚Äù Restart the app ‚Üí Everything switches to Uzbek. 003. Create New Note in One Click Press Ctrl + N ‚Üí New blank note Or click ‚Äú+‚Äù in the left sidebar Name the file right away (supports Latin or Cyrillic). 004. Headings with Hash Levels Syntax: # H1 Heading (Biggest) ## H2 Heading ### H3 Heading #### H4 Heading ##### H5 Heading ###### H6 Heading (smallest) Result: H1 Heading (Biggest) H2 Heading H3 Heading H4 Heading H5 Heading H6 Heading (smallest) 005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian Syntax: **bold** or __bold__ Result: bold or bold 006. How to Write Italic Text Fast Syntax: *italic* or _italic_ Result: italic or italic 007. Strikethrough Text Tutorial Syntax: ~~strikethrough~~ Result: strikethrough 008. Highlight Important Text Easily Syntax: ==highlight== Result: 009. Toolbar Quick Formatting Tips Select text ‚Üí use: Ctrl+B ‚Üí bold Ctrl+I ‚Üí italic Ctrl+D ‚Üí strikethrough Alt+H ‚Üí highlight 010. Horizontal Divider Line in Obsidian Syntax: --- *** ___ Result: 011. Block Quotes for Better Notes Syntax: > Single level quote >> Nested quote Result: Single level quote Nested quote 012. Bulleted Lists in Obsidian Syntax: - Item 1 - Item 2 - Sub-item Result: Item 1 Item 2 Sub-item 013. Numbered Lists Step by Step Syntax: 1. First 2. Second 3. Sub 1 4. Sub 2 Result: First Second 3. Sub 1 4. Sub 2 014. Indent and Outdent Lists Tab ‚Üí indent Shift+Tab ‚Üí outdent 015. Task Checkboxes in Obsidian Syntax: - [ ] Not done - [x] Done - [>] Deferred - [?] Question Result: Not done Done [>] Deferred [?] Question 016. Add External Links Correctly Syntax: [Obsidian](https://obsidian.md) Result: ‚Üí Obsidian 017. Simple Internal Links Wiki Style Syntax: [[031. Math in Obsidian]] Result: ‚Üí [[031. Math in Obsidian]] 018. Aliased Internal Links Syntax: LaTeX Guide Result: ‚Üí [LaTeX Guide]([[031. Math in Obsidian]]) 019. Link to Headings Inside Note Syntax: Bold Text Result: ‚Üí [Bold Text]([[Obsidian Guide#005. How to Make Text Bold in Obsidian]]) 020. Embed Notes with Exclamation Syntax: ![[001. Install Obsidian in 1 Minute]] Result: ‚Üí (embeds the whole note here) Resize example: !300 021. Code Blocks and Syntax Highlight Syntax:print("Hello Obsidian!") Result: print("Hello Obsidian!") 022. Create Tables in Obsidian Fast Syntax: | Name | Age | City | |:-------|:---:|-----------:| | Ali | 25 | Tashkent | | Vali | 30 | Samarkand | Result: Name Age City Ali 25 Tashkent Vali 30 Samarkand 023. Assets Folder Setup Syntax: Create folder ‚Üí Assets or Attachments ‚Üí drop all media there. 024. Embed Audio Files in Notes Syntax: ![[song.mp3]] Plays inline. Result: 025. Embed Local Video Files Easily Syntax: markdown ![[video.mp4]] html <video src="local_path_or_external_url_link" width="300" controls></video> Result: 026. Embed PDF Documents in Obsidian Syntax: ![[paper.pdf]] !200 ![[paper.pdf#page=5]] Shows page 5 directly. Result: !200 027. Add and Embed Images Properly Syntax: ![.[photo.jpg].] ![.[photo.jpg|400x300].] ![.[photo.jpg|right|250].] Aligns right with width 250px. Result: 028. Embed Maps Syntax: <iframe width=600 height=600 src="the_url_of_a_map" /> Result: 029. Callouts for Beautiful Notes Syntax: > [!info] Title > Useful information Result: [!info] Title Useful information Syntax: > [!tip] Quick Tip > Save time with this! Result: [!tip] Quick Tip Save time with this! Syntax: > [!warning] Careful > This might break something Result: [!warning] Careful This might break something Other types: note, abstract, success, error, example, quote 030. Flowcharts and Diagrams Fast (Mermaid) #InsideTripleBacktics Syntax: mermaid graph TD A[Start] --> B{Decision} B -->|Yes| C[Good] B -->|No| D[Try Again] Result: graph TD A[Start] --> B{Decision} B -->|Yes| C[Good] B -->|No| D[Try Again] - [x] *Result*: $E = mc^2$ ### Block: - [ ] *Syntax* ```code $$ \int_0^\infty e^{-x^2} \, dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2} $$ Result: ‚à´0‚àûe‚àíx2dx=œÄ2You‚Äôve mastered Obsidian basics! Next step: enable Core Plugins ‚Üí Graph View, Daily Notes, and explore Community Plugins. Happy note-taking! üöÄ

title: Basic.uz
content: Obsidian ‚Äî Boshlovchilar uchun qo'llanma (O'zbek tilida) 001. Yangi hamyon ochish (Yangi Vault yaratish) Obsidian-ni oching ‚ÄúCreate new vault‚Äù tugmasini bosing Vault nomini kiriting (masalan: ¬´Mening Bilimlarim¬ª) Kompyuteringizda kerakli joyni tanlang ‚Üí ‚ÄúCreate‚Äù Tayyor! Endi bu papka ichidagi barcha .md fayllar Obsidian bilan ochiladi. 002. O'zbek Tiliga O'tish Sozlamalar ‚Üí Appearance ‚Üí Language ‚ÄúUzbek (–é–∑–±–µ–∫)‚Äù ni tanlang Dasturni qayta ishga tushiring ‚Üí hammasi o‚Äòzbekcha bo‚Äòladi. 003. Yangi Eslatma Yaratish Ctrl + N ‚Üí yangi bo‚Äòsh eslatma Yoki chap paneldagi ‚Äú+‚Äù belgini bosing Fayl nomini darhol lotin yoki kirillda yozishingiz mumkin. 004. Sarlavhalar Bilan Ishlash # H1 ‚Äî Eng katta sarlavha ## H2 ### H3 #### H4 ##### H5 ###### H6 ‚Äî eng kichik 005. Qalin Matn Yozish **qalin matn** yoki __qalin matn__ ‚Üí ko‚Äòrinishi: **qalin matn** 006. Qiya Matn Yozish * qiya matn * yoki _qiya matn_ ‚Üí ko‚Äòrinishi: *qiya matn* 007. Ustiga Chizilgan Matn ~~ustiga chizilgan~~ ‚Üí ko‚Äòrinishi: ~~ustiga chizilgan~~ 008. Matnni Belgilash (Highlight) ==belgilangan matn== yoki `bitta backtick ichida` ‚Üí bitta backtick ichida 009. Tez Formatlash Tanlangan matn ustida: Ctrl + B ‚Üí qalin Ctrl + I ‚Üí qiya Ctrl + D ‚Üí ustiga chizish Alt + H ‚Üí belgilash 010. Gorizontal Chiziq --- yoki *** yoki ___ 011. Blok Iqtibos Yaratish > Oddiy iqtibos > > > Ichma-ich iqtibos 012. Tartiblanmagan Ro'yxat - Birinchi band - Ikkinchi band - Ichki band (2 bo‚Äòsh joy yoki Tab) 013. Tartiblangan Ro'yxat 1. Birinchi 2. Ikkinchi 3. Ichki 1 4. Ichki 2 014. Ro'yxat Sathini O'zgartirish Tab ‚Üí o‚Äòngga surish (sathni oshirish) Shift + Tab ‚Üí chapga surish (sathni kamaytirish) 015. Checkbox Vazifalar (Task) - [ ] Bajarilmagan vazifa - [x] Bajarilgan vazifa - [>] Keyinga qoldirilgan - [?] Savol 016. Tashqi Havola Qo'yish [Google](https://google.com) 017. Oddiy Ichki Link [[001. Yangi hamyon ochish]] 018. Nomlangan Ichki Link Yangi vault qanday ochiladi? 019. Sarlavhaga Link Berish Qalin matn haqida 020. Eslatmani Biriktirish (Embed) ![[001. Yangi hamyon ochish]] yoki kichikroq ko‚Äòrsatish uchun: !300 ‚Üê rasmni 300px ga qisqartiradi 021. Kod Bloklari Yaratish ```python print("Salom dunyo!") ``` 022. Jadval Qo'shish | Ism | Yosh | Shahar | |------------|:----:|-----------| | Ali | 25 | Toshkent | | Vali | 30 | Samarqand | 023. Media Uchun Papka Tayyorlash Vault ichida papka yarating ‚Üí masalan: 00-Attachments yoki Fayllar Keyin media fayllarni shu yerga tashlang. 024. Musiqa Biriktirish ![[music.mp3]] yoki to‚Äòg‚Äòridan hyperlink: [audio](music.mp3) 025. Video Biriktirish ![[video.mp4]] yoki YouTube: ![[https://youtu.be/dQw4w9WgXcQ]] 026. PDF Biriktirish ![[kitob.pdf]] yoki faqat sahifani ko‚Äòrsatish: ![[kitob.pdf#page=15]] 027. Rasm Biriktirish ![[rasm.jpg]] !300x400 ‚Üê kenglik va balandlik !right ‚Üê o‚Äòng tomonda 028. Xarita Biriktirish (Obsidian Maps yoki oddiy) ![[xarita.png]] yoki onlayn xarita: [Google Maps](https://maps.app.goo.gl/...) 029. Konvert Bloklari (Callouts) > [!info] Ma‚Äôlumot > Bu yerda muhim ma‚Äôlumotlar > [!tip] Maslahat > Foydali maslahat > [!warning] Ehtiyot bo‚Äòling > Xavfli harakat > [!question] Savol > Nimani aniqlashtirish kerak? Boshqa turlari: note, abstract, success, error, example, quote 030. Mermaid Diagrammalar graph TD A[Obsidian] --> B[Yangi eslatma] A --> C[Linklar] A --> D[Pluginlar]Yana misollar: flowchart, sequence, gantt, pie chart va boshqalar. 031. Matematik Ifodalar | LaTeX Bir qatorli: $ E = mc^2 $ Blok ichida: $ \int_0^\infty e^{-x^2} dx = \frac{\sqrt{\pi}}{2} $ Ko'rinishi: ‚à´0‚àûe‚àíx2dx=œÄ2Tabriklaymiz, endi siz Obsidian-ning asosiy funksiyalarini to‚Äòliq bilasiz!

content: Sorry for that, the obsidian tutorial series were recorded in uzbek.

title: Welcome to online!.en
content: See why you should choose me?

title: Why you should choose me?.en
content:
Why Clients Will Choose ME Over Any Other Web Developer

You wake up tomorrow with a real, live, public website already online ‚Äì no waiting weeks, no back-and-forth, no ‚Äúlearning curve‚Äù. I deliver it 100 % ready in 24‚Äì48 hours.
Zero recurring costs forever: no hosting bills, no WordPress updates, no plugin subscriptions. GitHub Pages = free for life.
You keep 100 % ownership and control ‚Äì everything lives in your own GitHub account (not mine, not some shady agency server).
I set it up so you never touch code again if you don‚Äôt want to. You just open Obsidian (the app you probably already love) ‚Üí write or drag-and-drop ‚Üí save ‚Üí your site updates automatically in seconds.

Why Obsidian Is the Perfect Brain for Your Website

You already think in notes and links ‚Äì Obsidian is the best tool on earth for that.
Write once, publish everywhere: the same vault becomes your personal knowledge base AND your public website.
Beautiful typography, instant search, tags, backlinks, graph view ‚Äì all work on the live site with zero extra plugins.
Works offline, syncs with your phone, supports folders, images, PDFs, embeds, everything you already use.
Future-proof: if you ever outgrow it, your content is just Markdown files ‚Äì you can move anywhere tomorrow.

Why GitHub + GitHub Pages Beats Every Other Option

What People Usually Pay For
Monthly Cost
Your Cost With My Service

Shared hosting + WordPress
$5‚Äì30/mo
$0 forever

Netlify / Vercel (free tier)
$0‚Äì20/mo
$0 forever

Custom domain (you bring it)
$12/year
Same $12/year

Security updates, backups, plugins
Hours of work
Handled automatically

GitHub Pages is powered by the same infrastructure that runs millions of sites ‚Äì rock-solid, globally fast, HTTPS by default.
Automatic HTTPS certificate, automatic scaling, 99.99 % uptime ‚Äì better than most paid hosts.
Built-in version history: break something? Just click ‚Äúrevert‚Äù in GitHub. No backups to manage.

Why So Incredibly Cheap ($5‚Äì10 range)
Because I‚Äôm not selling you hosting, servers, or my time forever.
I‚Äôm selling you one afternoon of my expertise to save you 50+ hours of frustration and hundreds of dollars per year.
Most freelancers charge $300‚Äì$1500 for a custom static site.
I charge less than a dinner for two because:

The entire stack is free (GitHub + Obsidian + open-source themes)
I reuse the same bulletproof template (customized for you in minutes)
My mission is to get as many people as possible publishing this way ‚Äì the lower the price, the more lives I change.

Who This Is Perfect For (make them see themselves)

Writers who are tired of Medium taking their traffic
Researchers & students who want a beautiful public vault
Indie hackers needing a landing page or documentation site
Consultants wanting a clean portfolio without the bloat
Anyone who believes their notes deserve to be seen by the world

If you‚Äôve ever thought ‚ÄúI wish my Obsidian notes could just be my website‚Äù ‚Äì this gig turns that wish into reality tomorrow morning.
Ready? Send me your GitHub username (or say ‚Äúcreate one for me‚Äù) and the site name you want.
I‚Äôll handle everything else and hand you the keys to your new permanent corner of the internet.
Click ‚ÄúOrder Now‚Äù and tomorrow you‚Äôll have a real website that updates every time you click a button in Obsidian.
